name: All is Chaos in Love and War
name_original: All is Chaos in Love and War
description:
The kingdom of Liere needs you! 

Warning: Usage of logic and common sense not recommended.

Choose 1 of 4 hero classes and begin to save the kingdom! Options include Knight, Wizard, Archer and Musketeer! Each class can purchase different equipment from the shop to increase your stats.

Discover the sudden twist in the short story plus other jokes and easter eggs.

The game features THREE different endings, can you manage to find them all?

Made for Community Game Jam 2019

Note: Minor bug, DO NOT click the return button in the character selection screen.
